pageContext.claim: “It's a choice between the safety and patriotism and prosperity offered by our movement and the anarchy, and that's exactly what it is. When you look at Portland and you look at what goes on in Democrat-run cities and states, chaos, crime, and socialism promised by a puppet like Joe Biden, that has no clue.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a false straw-man choice. Biden condemned violence in erupted in some instances after peaceful protests.
